Class MemoryPageFile

Namespace
MapQuest.Features.SpatialIndexers
Assembly
MapQuest.Features.dll

Implements a memory page file. Holds all pages into a Hashtable with keys equal to each object's page number.

public sealed class MemoryPageFile : PageFile, IDisposable
